mapper.location: Crown Street Food, Crown Street, Lillington

expect.name: useDefault
expect.label: Use the default reminder settings for this event

expect.name: sendUpdates
expect.label: Send notifications about the event creation

mapper.html:
🍽️ Booking Confirmed!

Dear {{2.name}},

Your table reservation at Crown Street Food has been confirmed:

  • 📅 Date: {{formatDate(parseDate(20.DateTimeParsed); "dddd, MMMM Do YYYY")}}
  • 🕐 Time: {{formatDate(parseDate(20.DateTimeParsed); "h:mm A")}}
  • 👥 Party Size: {{2.guests}} guests
  • 🆔 Booking ID: {{22.id}}
    • {{if(length(2.special_requests) > 0; "
  • 📝 Special Requests: " + 2.special_requests + "
    • "; "")}}

🏪 Restaurant Details:

Crown Street Food
Crown Street, Lillington

📞 Contact: [Your phone number]
🕒 Hours: Mon-Fri 12PM-10PM, Sat-Sun 1PM-11PM

We look forward to serving you! 🎉

Need to modify your booking? Please call us or reply to this email.
mapper.subject: Crown Street Food - Booking Confirmation

mapper.body:
{
  "available": true,
  "message": "Booking confirmed for {{2.guests}} guests on {{formatDate(parseDate(20.DateTimeParsed; \ + "YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ\"); \ + "MMMM Do\")}} at {{formatDate(parseDate(20.DateTimeParsed; \ + "YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ\"); \ + "h:mm A\")}} under {{2.name}}. Confirmation sent to {{2.email}}.",
  "booking_id": "{{22.id}}",
  "reservationDate": "{{formatDate(parseDate(20.DateTimeParsed; \ + "YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ\"); \ + "YYYY-MM-DD\")}}",
  "reservationTime": "{{formatDate(parseDate(20.DateTimeParsed; \ + "YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ\"); \ + "HH:mm\")}}",
  "numberOfGuests": {{2.guests}},
  "email": "{{2.email}}",
  "phoneNumber": "{{2.phone}}",
  "alternatives": []
}
